SOL.MC.summary: Soltec Power Holdings, S.A. engages in the design, manufacture, and supply of solar trackers and related components in Latin America, North America, Mexico, Europe, the Middle East and Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. The company provides a range of development, equipment supply, construction, and operations and maintenance services. Its principal products include SF7 single-axis and bi-facial trackers, SF7 Tandem trackers, and SF8 single-axis and bi-facial trackers. The company also offers design, procurement, installation, and construction services to solar power projects; and warranty and care services to its customers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Murcia, Spain.
